content: this crochet slipper sock pattern only requires 1 skein to make yourself or your loved ones an adorable comfy pair of these slipper socks beginner friendly easy to make and only requires one skein sounds like the perfect crochet gift idea pattern includes us women s shoe sizes 5-12 but they re stretchy and you could realistically adjust them to fit anyone with a small effort includes a link to a full length video tutorial as well materials #5 bulky weight yarn i used red heart hygge #5 bulky weight yarn 5mm crochet hook scissors yarn needle skill easy notes this pattern uses english us terminology this pattern made as women s shoe sizes 5/6 7/8 9/10 11/12 keep in mind these slippers can stretch a little so the sizes are flexible depending on how you want them to fit in the pictures i have demonstrated with size 7/8 gauge slipper part = 12 double_crochet x 6 row = 4 cuff part = 12 half_double_crochet x 8 row = 4 yarn needed 150 160 175 185 yards thank you for stopping by happy crocheting
